heroes.title: Ponyo
heroes.synopsis: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

heroes.title: Howl's Moving Castle
heroes.synopsis: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

heroes.title: Spy x Family
heroes.synopsis: A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover. His wife and daughter have secrets of their own, and all three must strive to keep together.

heroes.title: Cardcaptor Sakura
heroes.synopsis: Sakura stumbled upon the book of Clow Cards in a library. Accidentally setting the magical cards loose, it's now up to Sakura to catch them all with her best friend Tomoyo, and Kerberos, the guardian of the cards.

heroes.title: Spirited Away
heroes.synopsis: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

heroes.title: Haikyu!!
heroes.synopsis: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed the small giant, Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.

movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro
movies.synopsis: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

movies.title: Kiki's Delivery Service
movies.synopsis: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.synopsis: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.synopsis: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Howl's Moving Castle
movies.synopsis: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

movies.title: Ponyo
movies.synopsis: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

movies.title: From Up on Poppy Hill
movies.synopsis: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.

movies.title: Grave of the Fireflies
movies.synopsis: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

movies.title: The Secret World of Arrietty
movies.synopsis: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter Arrietty is discovered.

movies.title: Ocean Waves
movies.synopsis: As a young man returns home after his first year away at college he recalls his senior year of high school and the iron-willed, big city girl that turned his world upside down.

movies.title: Whisper of the Heart
movies.synopsis: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

movies.title: The Cat Returns
movies.synopsis: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

series.title: Attack on Titan
series.synopsis: After his hometown is destroyed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

series.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
series.synopsis: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

series.title: Naruto: Shippuden
series.synopsis: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

series.title: Cardcaptor Sakura
series.synopsis: Sakura stumbled upon the book of Clow Cards in a library. Accidentally setting the magical cards loose, it's now up to Sakura to catch them all with her best friend Tomoyo, and Kerberos, the guardian of the cards.

series.title: Haikyu!!
series.synopsis: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed the small giant, Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.

series.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
series.synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

series.title: Spy x Family
series.synopsis: A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover. His wife and daughter have secrets of their own, and all three must strive to keep together.

series.title: Hunter x Hunter
series.synopsis: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.

series.title: One Piece
series.synopsis: Monkey D. Luffy sets off on an adventure with his pirate crew in hopes of finding the greatest treasure ever, known as the One Piece.

series.title: Detective Conan
series.synopsis: The cases of a detective whose physical age was chemically reversed to that of a prepubescent boy but must hide his true mental development.

series.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
series.synopsis: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

series.title: My Hero Academia
series.synopsis: A superhero-admiring boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero, after the strongest superhero grants him his own powers.
